issue.title: self_collide should be a model property, not a link property

content.raw:
If we make it a property of a model, then we can't turn self-collision on/off on a link by link basis for a model. Let's say you only want the arms of a robot to self-collide.

Self-collide should be off for a majority of models. A robot with a articulated arms and/or legs and is the biggest exception, but it is also the least common object in simulation numbering 1 or less in a typical simulation scenario.
